title: Life and Death
description: A child goes through a rite of passage with unexpected results.

title: Justice
description: Two Jedi are dispatched to resolve a hostage situation on a distant planet.

title: Choices
description: Jedi Knights investigate the mysterious death of one of their own.

title: The Sith Lord
description: A Jedi master makes a troubling discovery.

title: Practice Makes Perfect
description: A Jedi Padawan is given a seemingly impossible exercise.

title: Resolve
description: A former Jedi is faced with the truth that they cannot be something they are not.
